name: Syslog Input
description: Ingest Syslog payloads over UDP. Requires Seq 5.1+.

syslogAddress.helpText: The url (protocol, IP address and port) on which the input will listen for Syslog payloads. The default is `udp://0.0.0.0:514`.

enableDiagnostics.helpText: Controls the verbosity of diagnostic logs produced by the server. When enabled metrics will be regularly sampled and written back to Seq.
